H0.text: American Callan Pinckney's eponymously named system became a best-selling (1980s-2000s) book/video franchise in what genre. Dance

H1.text: American Callan Pinckney's eponymously named system became a best-selling (1980s-2000s) book/video franchise in what genre. Yoga

H2.text: American Callan Pinckney's eponymously named system became a best-selling (1980s-2000s) book/video franchise in what genre. Martial Arts

H3.text: American Callan Pinckney's eponymously named system became a best-selling (1980s-2000s) book/video franchise in what genre. Fitness

A4.text: Pinckney's nine books became international best-sellers and the video series that followed sold over 6 million copies.

A5.text: Pinckney's first video release, Callanetics: 10 Years Younger In 10 Hours, outsold every other fitness video in the US.
